name: Tenore di Bitti "Mialinu Pira"
description: '''Tenore di Bitti "Mialinu Pira"''' is an Italian ensemble formed in 1995, specialized in the [[Sardinia]]n [[cantu a tenore]]. The Cantu a tenore is a style of polyphonic folk singing characteristic of the [[Barbagia]] region of the island, even though some other Sardinian sub-regions bear examples of such tradition. The [[cantu a tenore]] was proclaimed by the UNESCO "Masterpieces of the Oral and Intangible Heritage" in 2005.
